attributes.action: Stop any further development in or around Thurrock Lakeside
attributes.additional_details:
The infrastructure needs be looked at before any more development is planned and started. As residents in the area we know what it is like on a regular basis. 
Please support this petition if you live in Thurrock and or use the M25 and the Dartford Bridge or tunnels at any point as you would have been caught up in issues on the M25 around lakeside at some stage
attributes.background:
Thurrock lakeside. Is on top of the M25, and a current hub for the dartford bridge and and tunnel. When there is an accident the area becomes totalally gridlock. 
C2C run trains which can’t cope with the amount of commuters they currently have.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
